text: isn´t there some app that does this already, that  can be connected to HS like the ones in the <http://ecosystem.HubSpot.com|ecosystem.HubSpot.com> directory?

Hello All! I'm having a hard time building reports for this particular client, that wants to   see page view from a selected tracked page / leads from certain Ads campaigns / form submission from a certain form, all this in a spreadsheet like style, in numbers, and if possible, convertion percentage. The closest it get is the Ads screen, but they have many campaigns blocked due to tracking issue (i.e: using google smart campaigns).
Anyone can help me here? perhaps some B.I tool would be usefull, i've tried some with no success.. :confused:
there is an app in the app marketplace
that's is a case, but they don't show page views.
you can also access the data via the API´s and take the data into Excel for example
or into a tool of your choice
direct API to Excel you mean? or google sheets?
i meant get the data from HS and import that Data Dump into a tool of your choice
i guess that's the case. but it's so simple, i think HubSpot could have this kind of report available.
you can also connect it to another app via the app marketplace. maybe this helps: <https://ecosystem.HubSpot.com/marketplace/apps/marketing/analytics-data?eco_features=REPORTS_DASHBOARDS>

Idea: Allow configuration of Rich Text modules to limit which elements the user can place in them.

i.e. only allow `<h2><p><ul>`
